org.netbeans.api.search 1.24

Uses of Package
org.netbeans.api.search

  • Packages that use org.netbeans.api.search 
    Package Description
    org.netbeans.api.search
    This package contains classes that can be used by modules that need to work with Search in Projects dialog, or want to share information about what data was recently searched.
    org.netbeans.api.search.provider
    Classes that you may need to work with if you are implementing a custom search provider.
    org.netbeans.api.search.ui
    Helpers for creating UI controls for your search provider that are similar to controls in the default provider.
    org.netbeans.spi.search
    This package contains classes that you can subclass and register to lookups of nodes if you want to specify how the nodes should be searched.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.search used by org.netbeans.api.search 
    Class and Description
    ReplacePattern
    Pattern describes the replace conditions ReplacePattern is a wrap class for replace expression.
    SearchHistory
    Shareable search history.
    SearchPattern
    Pattern describes the search conditions
    SearchPattern.MatchType
    Specifies how the pattern is matched to the searched text.
    SearchScopeOptions
    This class holds user options and custom filters.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.search used by org.netbeans.api.search.provider 
    Class and Description
    SearchRoot
    Search root is a pair containing a folder (or file) and a set of search filters.
    SearchScopeOptions
    This class holds user options and custom filters.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.search used by org.netbeans.api.search.ui 
    Class and Description
    SearchPattern
    Pattern describes the search conditions
    SearchScopeOptions
    This class holds user options and custom filters.
  • Classes in org.netbeans.api.search used by org.netbeans.spi.search 
    Class and Description
    SearchRoot
    Search root is a pair containing a folder (or file) and a set of search filters.
    SearchScopeOptions
    This class holds user options and custom filters.
